Primary Contact: Lisa Marsh, BA, ECE, Aboriginal Supported Child Development Coordinator; Phone: 250.868.0351 ext 105 * 250.317.0536; Email: ascd@mcsbc.org
Primary Executive: Eva Coles, Executive Director; Email: ed@mcsbc.org
Service Details: - Offers culturally appropriate services to children who experience delays in the physical, cognitive, communicative, social/emotional, or behavioural domains- A family centered program offering supports that include individual support for children, education and consultation with childcare centre staff, and parent education and supports- Provides advocacy and support in accessing community services- Conducts developmental screenings/assessments at the request of families/caregivers- Referrals to community partners and early intervention therapies, such as OT, PT, SLP, counselling services, etc.
Eligibility: Ages: 12 year(s) and underServices provided for children 13-18 in some circumstances
